member.name: T:IronPdf.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: IronPDF is a.NET library allowing the generation and manipulation of PDF files in C# and other .Net projects.

member.name: T:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf
member.summary: IronPdf.HtmlToPdf allows any web page or Html 'snippet' to be turned into a Pdf document.

member.name: M:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf.StaticRenderUrlAsPdf(System.Uri,IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions,IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials)
member.summary: Static version of the function. Renders all Html and assets at a given Url into a Pdf file.
member.param: An absolute Uri. Points to the Html document to be rendered as a Pdf.
Instance of . Optional print options and settings.
Instance of . Optional login credentials for Windows, Linux and Html Form login environments.

member.name: M:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf.StaticRenderHtmlAsPdf(System.String,System.Uri,IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions)
member.summary: Static version of the function. Renders any Html strings into a Pdf document.
member.param: Html to be turned into a Pdf.
Setting the BaseURL property gives the Html a relative for content links such as hyperlinks, images, Css and JavaScript files.
Instance of . Optional print options and settings.

member.name: M:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf.RenderUrlAsPdf(System.Uri)
member.summary: Renders the URL as Pdf binary data.
member.param: An absolute Uri. Points to the Html document to be rendered as a Pdf.

member.name: M:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf.RenderHtmlAsPdf(System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a Pdf file from an Html string, and returns it as an IronPdf.PdfResource
member.param: The Html to be rendered as a Pdf.
Setting the BaseURL property gives the relative context for hyperlinks, images, Css and JavaScript files.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf.PrintOptions
member.summary: An instance of the class. Sets Pdf output options such as Paper-Size, Dpi, Headers and Footers.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf.LoginCredentials
member.summary: An instance of the class. Allows developers to specify login credentials using Windows, Linux or Html Forms based authentication. This allows Pdfs to be printed, even if they reside on private Intranets, Extranets or within 'login' areas of websites.

member.name: M:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf.#ctor
member.summary: The IronPdf.HtmlToPdf allows developers to create Pdf files from any web page or Html Snippet

member.name: M:IronPdf.HtmlToPdf.#ctor(IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions)
member.param: Sets Pdf output options such as paper-size, dpi, headers and footers using an instance of the IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions Class.

member.name: T:IronPdf.AspxToPdf
member.summary: Renders any .Net Web Page (ASPX) into a Pdf Document. Simply add it to the Page_Load event.

member.name: T:IronPdf.AspxToPdf.FileBehavior
member.summary: Determines the web browser behavior towards a Pdf document.

member.name: F:IronPdf.AspxToPdf.FileBehavior.Attachment
member.summary: Instructs the user's web-browser to download the Pdf as a file.

member.name: F:IronPdf.AspxToPdf.FileBehavior.InBrowser
member.summary: Instructs the user's web-browser to render the Pdf wherever possible.

member.name: M:IronPdf.AspxToPdf.RenderThisPageAsPdf(IronPdf.AspxToPdf.FileBehavior,System.String,IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions)
member.param: Specifies if the Pdf file should be downloaded as an attachment, or displayed directly in the browser of users.
The file-name of the Pdf. If no name is set, a suitable name will be automatically assigned chosen based on the Html title, PrintOptions or name of the ASPX page.
Sets Pdf output options such as pdf Title, paper-size, dpi, headers and footers.

member.name: T:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials
member.summary: Provides credentials for IronPdf to log-in to an intranet, extranet or website, impersonating a user. This allows a unique ability to render web-pages as Pdfs even on secure intranets, extranets and websites.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.NetworkUsername
member.summary: Optional: Username credential for Windows / Linux network security authentication.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.NetworkPassword
member.summary: Optional: Password credential for Windows / Linux network security authentication.

member.name: P:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.UserAgent
member.summary: The Http User-Agent header which will be used to fetch any remote HTML.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.LoginFormUrl
member.summary: Optional: Gives the URL to post website login-form authentication. Should be the absolute Url which the form's action attribute specifies.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.LoginFormPostVariables
member.summary: Optional: Specifies a collection of HTTP form variables to post/submit to .

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.CustomPostVariables
member.summary:
Optional: Specifies a collection of HTTP 'POST' variables to submit on every Pdf rendering request.
Note: The 'key' is the name of the post field, The 'value' is its value. UrlEncoding is not required.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.CustomPostFiles
member.summary:
Optional, Advanced Usage: Specifies a collection files to summited on every Pdf rendering request. Allows images and documents to be submitted to forms such that the output will be rendered as an Pdf.
Note: The Key is the name of the post field, The value is the full file path.. UrlEncoding is not required.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.CustomCookies
member.summary: A Dictionary which allows custom cookies to be posted with every login request, and HTTP request made by RenderUriToHml methods.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.EnableCookies
member.summary: Enables cookies to be stored and sent when using RenderUriToHml methods.

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.Proxy
member.summary: Specifies an Http proxy server. Use the pattern: http(s)://username:password@host:port/

member.name: F:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.CustomHttpHeaders
member.summary: A dictionary of custom HTTP headers to be sent with every HTTP Request

member.name: M:IronPdf.HttpLoginCredentials.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor cleans up all temporary cookies files for the HttpLoginCredentials instance.

member.name: T:IronPdf.PdfResource
member.summary: A Pdf File generated by IronPdf. It can be saved to a file, or accessed programmatically as a Stream or ByteArray.

member.name: M:IronPdf.PdfResource.#ctor(System.Byte[],IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions)
member.summary: A Pdf File generated by IronPdf. It can be saved to a file, or accessed programmatically as a Stream or ByteArray.

member.name: P:IronPdf.PdfResource.BinaryData
member.summary: Gets the Pdf as a ByteArray ( byte[] )

member.name: P:IronPdf.PdfResource.Stream
member.summary: Gets the Pdf as a System.IO.MemoryStream

member.name: M:IronPdf.PdfResource.SaveAs(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the Pdf to the local file-system
member.param: Full local file path to save the Pdf document.
member.returns: Bool - True if success, False if failure (check path is valid)

member.name: T:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions
member.summary: Pdf output options for IronPdf. Specifies options such as Paper-Size, Dpi, Headers and Footers.

member.name: T:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfPaperSize
member.summary: Defines the target paper size the pdf will use of pagination. Relates to real-world paper-sizes.

member.name: T:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfHeaderFooter
member.summary: Defines Pdf Header and Footer display options.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfHeaderFooter.LeftText
member.summary:
Sets the left hand side header text for the Pdf document.
Merge meta-data data into your header using any of these placeholder strings: {page} {total-pages} {url} {date} {time} {html-title} {pdf-title}

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfHeaderFooter.CenterText
member.summary:
Sets the centered header text for the Pdf document.
Merge meta-data data into your header using any of these placeholder strings: {page} {total-pages} {url} {date} {time} {html-title} {pdf-title}

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfHeaderFooter.RightText
member.summary:
Sets the right hand side header text for the Pdf document.
Merge meta-data data into your header using any of these placeholder strings: {page} {total-pages} {url} {date} {time} {html-title} {pdf-title}

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfHeaderFooter.FontFamily
member.summary: Font used to render the Pdf header.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfHeaderFooter.FontSize
member.summary: Font size in px.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfHeaderFooter.DrawDividerLine
member.summary: Adds a horizontal line divider between the header text (or html) and the page content on every page of the Pdf document.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfHeaderFooter.Spacing
member.summary: Space between the header and page content in millimeters.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.Header
member.summary: Sets the footer content for every Pdf page as Html or String. Supports 'mail-merge'.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.Footer
member.summary: Sets the header content for every Pdf page as Html or String. Supports 'mail-merge'.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.LicenseKey
member.summary: Removes watermarks. Get Licensed at http://ironpdf.com/license

member.name: T:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfPaperOrientation
member.summary: Portrait or Landscape

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.InputEncoding
member.summary: The input character encoding as a string;

member.name: M:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.SetCustomPaperSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set an output paper size for Pdf pages. Dimensions are in millimeters.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.Zoom
member.summary: The zoom level in %. Enlarges the rendering size of Html documents.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.DPI
member.summary: Printing output Dpi. 300 is standard for most print jobs. Higher resolutions produce clearer images and text, but also larger Pdf files.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.GrayScale
member.summary: Outputs a black-and-white Pdf

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.CustomCssUrl
member.summary: Allows a custom CSS stylesheet to be applied to Html before rendering. May be a local file path, or remote url.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.JpegQuality
member.summary: Quality of any image that must be re-sampled. 0-100

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.MarginLeft
member.summary: Paper margin in millimeters. Set to zero for borderless and commercial printing applications.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.MarginBottom
member.summary: Paper margin in millimeters. Set to zero for borderless and commercial printing applications.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.MarginTop
member.summary: Paper margin in millimeters. Set to zero for borderless and commercial printing applications.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.MarginRight
member.summary: Paper margin in millimeters. Set to zero for borderless and commercial printing applications.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PaperSize
member.summary:
Set an output paper size for Pdf pages. System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.
Use SetCustomPaperSize(int width, int height) for custom sizes.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PaperOrientation
member.summary: The Pdf paper orientation.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PrintHtmlBackgrounds
member.summary: Prints background-colors and images from Html

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.CssMediaType
member.summary:
Enables Media="screen" Css Styles and StyleSheets
Note: By setting AllowScreenCss=false, IronPdf prints using css for media="print" only.

member.name: T:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.PdfCssMediaType
member.summary: Defines which stylesheet should be rendered. 'Print' or 'Screen'. This matches the CSS3 Media Queries standard.

members.member: Renders as expected for a web browser.
Ignores 'Print' styles and includes additional 'Screen' styles where available.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.EnableJavaScript
member.summary:
Enables JavaScript and Json to be executed for 100ms before the page is rendered. Ideal for printing from Ajax / Angular Applications.
Note: By default - IronPdf disables all JavaScript.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.CreatePdfFormsFromHtml
member.summary: Turns all Html forms elements into editable Pdf forms.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.Title
member.summary: Pdf Document Name and Title meta-data. Not required.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.FitToPaperWidth
member.summary: Where possible, fits the Pdf content to 1 page width.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.RenderDelay
member.summary: Milliseconds to wait after Html is rendered before printing. This can use useful when considering the rendering of JavaScript, Ajax or animations.

member.name: F:IronPdf.PdfPrintOptions.FirstPageNumber
member.summary: First page number to be used in Pdf headers and footers.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.FooterSettings.CenterText
member.summary: Sets center text for the header/footer. Following replaces occur in this text: * [page] Replaced by the number of the pages currently being printed * [frompage] Replaced by the number of the first page to be printed * [topage] Replaced by the number of the last page to be printed * [webpage] Replaced by the URL of the page being printed * [section] Replaced by the name of the current section * [subsection] Replaced by the name of the current subsection * [date] Replaced by the current date in system local format * [time] Replaced by the current time in system local format

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.FooterSettings.ContentSpacing
member.summary: Amount of space between header/footer and content in millimeters

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.FooterSettings.FontName
member.summary: Font name for the header, e.g. "Courier New"

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.FooterSettings.FontSize
member.summary: The font size in pt

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.FooterSettings.HtmlUrl
member.summary: URL for the HTML document to use as a header

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.FooterSettings.LeftText
member.summary: Sets left text for the header/footer. Following replaces occur in this text: * [page] Replaced by the number of the pages currently being printed * [frompage] Replaced by the number of the first page to be printed * [topage] Replaced by the number of the last page to be printed * [webpage] Replaced by the URL of the page being printed * [section] Replaced by the name of the current section * [subsection] Replaced by the name of the current subsection * [date] Replaced by the current date in system local format * [time] Replaced by the current time in system local format

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.FooterSettings.RightText
member.summary: Sets right text for the header/footer. Following replaces occur in this text: * [page] Replaced by the number of the pages currently being printed * [frompage] Replaced by the number of the first page to be printed * [topage] Replaced by the number of the last page to be printed * [webpage] Replaced by the URL of the page being printed * [section] Replaced by the name of the current section * [subsection] Replaced by the name of the current subsection * [date] Replaced by the current date in system local format * [time] Replaced by the current time in system local format

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.FooterSettings.UseLineSeparator
member.summary: Whether or not to print a line between the header/footer and content (Default: false)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.Collate
member.summary: Whether to collate the copies. (Default: false)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.ColorMode
member.summary: Whether to print in color or grayscale. (Default: color)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.CookieJar
member.summary: The path of a file used to store cookies.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.Copies
member.summary: How many copies to print. (Default: 1)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.DocumentTitle
member.summary: The title of the PDF document.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.DPI
member.summary: The DPI to use when printing.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.DumpOutline
member.summary: The path of a file to dump an XML outline of the document to.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.ImageDPI
member.summary: The maximum DPI to use for images printed in the document.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.Margins
member.summary: The margins to use throughout the document.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.Orientation
member.summary: The orientation of the output document, either Portrait or Landscape. (Default: Portrait)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.OutlineDepth
member.summary: The maximum depth of the outline. (Default: 4)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.OutputFile
member.summary: A path to output the converted document to.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.OutputFormat
member.summary: Whether to output PDF or PostScript. (Default: PDF)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.PageOffset
member.summary: A number that is added to all page numbers when printing headers, footers and table of content.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.PaperSize
member.summary: The size of the output document.

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.ProduceOutline
member.summary: Whether to generate an outline for the document. (Default: false)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.UseCompression
member.summary: Whether to use lossless compression when creating the pdf file. (Default: true)

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.PaperHeight
member.summary: The height of the output document, e.g. "12in".

member.name: P:IronPdf.ThreadSaftyManager.ChromeRenderingGlobalSettings.PaperWidth
member.summary: The with of the output document, e.g. "4cm".
